General.Name: SnowWorld N.V.
General.Description: SnowWorld N.V. owns and operates indoor ski resorts. The company operates in Landgraaf, Zoetermeer, Amsterdam, Rucphen, and Terneuzen, the Netherlands, as well as Neuss in Germany; and Amnéville in France. It also operates winter sports specialist shops, as well as an indoor skydive center; and a hotel. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Zoetermeer, the Netherlands.
